sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-app-bar app color="primary" dark>
      <!-- Left Side -->
      <v-app-bar-nav-icon @click="drawer = !drawer"></v-app-bar-nav-icon>
      <v-toolbar-title class="ml-3">My Store</v-toolbar-title>
      
      <!-- Right Side -->
      <v-spacer></v-spacer>
      <v-btn text>Home</v-btn>
      <v-btn text>Shop</v-btn>
      <v-btn text>Cart</v-btn>
  
      <v-menu offset-y>
        <template v-slot:activator="{ on, attrs }">
          <v-btn text v-bind="attrs" :v-on:click="on.click">Profile</v-btn>
        </template>
        <v-list>
          <v-list-item @click="editProfile">
            <v-list-item-title>Edit Profile</v-list-item-title>
          </v-list-item>
          <v-list-item @click="logout">
            <v-list-item-title>Logout</v-list-item-title>
          </v-list-item>
        </v-list>
      </v-menu>
    </v-app-bar>
  
    <!-- Side Drawer for Mobile -->
    <v-navigation-drawer v-model="drawer" app>
      <v-list>
        <v-list-item @click="">
          <v-list-item-title>Home</v-list-item-title>
        </v-list-item>
        <v-list-item @click="">
          <v-list-item-title>Shop</v-list-item-title>
        </v-list-item>
        <v-list-item @click="">
          <v-list-item-title>Cart</v-list-item-title>
        </v-list-item>
        <v-list-item @click="editProfile">
          <v-list-item-title>Edit Profile</v-list-item-title>
        </v-list-item>
        <v-list-item @click="logout">
          <v-list-item-title>Logout</v-list-item-title>
        </v-list-item>
      </v-list>
    </v-navigation-drawer>
  </template>
  
  <script>
  export default {
    data: () => ({
      drawer: false
    }),
    methods: {
      editProfile() {
        // Logic for editing profile
      },
      logout() {
        // Logic for logging out
      }
    }
  }
  </script>
  
  <style scoped>
  .v-toolbar-title {
    font-size: 1.25rem;
  }
  </style>
